features: 【All Day Comfort】Ergonomical padded backrest and padded armrests provides excellent support for the back and arms. The thickened high-density cushion of the waiting room chairs is also softer, breathable, and not easily deformed, making it more comfortable for long-term sitting

【Sturdy】The reception chairs are designed with solid metal legs and can hold up to 275 lbs, robust and durable. The lobby chairs have a stable structure, a uniform center of gravity, and is not easy to slip
【Well Built & Premium Materials】Exquisite workmanship and high quality PU leather give this office guest chair a classic look that will add a modern touch to any space

【Multi-functional】This guest chair is classic and stylish in appearance, comfortable to sit in, durable, and can match a variety of styles of space, perfect for offices, study rooms, reception room, waiting room, and more

【Easy to Assemble】This waiting room chair comes with all hardware & necessary tools and can be installed within 15 minutes. It can be can be easily installed according to the video we provide. If you have any questions about the waiting room chairs with arms, please do not hesitate to contact us. We are always with you

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Sweetcrispy is formed to streamline home and office decor by providing ergonomically sound chairs that put your comfort at the forefront.
Through relentless refining of our products, we’ve managed to perfect the chair to peak performance.
Waiting Room Chairs Conference Chairs Reception Chairs Office Chair Dinning Chairs

Padded Backrest Ergonomically padded backrest provides comfortable support for the back. Thickened Cushion The thickened high-density cushion is comfortable, breathable, and not easily deformed, making it more comfortable for long-term sitting. Padded Armrests The padded armrests provide comfortable arm support and are ideal for entertaining guests, working, reading, and dining. Sturdy Base This office guest chair without wheels has a stable structure, a uniform center of gravity, and is not easy to slip.

What is the weight capacity of this waiting room chair? The weight capacity of this reception chair is 275 pounds. What is the seat width of this office guest chair? The seat width of this executive office chair is 20.87 inches. What material is this desk chair made of? It is made of high-quality synthetic leather, high-density foam, and sturdy metal. How to install our guest chair? To simplify installation, watch the provided video and follow these tips: Tighten screws halfway on one side, then do the same on the other side. Ensure hole alignment between backrest and seat cushion, then fully tighten screws on both sides.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy chair, brought tears of joy
reviews.reviewText: Did a lot of searching for a good chair in my house after hip replacement surgery. I’m only 37 years old, experienced some trauma, got a bionic hip. Our furniture is cute, but not practical/comfy. We’re not much for lounging. However, I’m now in need of comfort and support, and am sick of being stuck alone in bed. These chairs came today, my 12 and 14 year old kids put them together for me, super easy. Thumbs up! My husband tested the chair with some solid sit-downs, and then I put it to the test. It was a solid sit. Not too far to go down before resting. Cushions were surprisingly supportive and cushy. I felt good. I cried, for-real tears. It’s been weeks beyond weeks since I’ve sat with my family, not confined to my bedroom. After a while of sitting I was exhausted and ready for bed, but felt good all things considered. Time for the standing up test. Nervously, I grabbed on to my walker, kicked my leg out and prepped for takeoff. And I stood. Not too far to go up to get up! Wonderful! I’m hoping to heal before I get too comfortable sitting down all day, boy I miss standing. Thankful for these chairs. It’s the little things.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Office Chairs for Guests
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these chairs as my office guest chairs. They were easy to assemble by myself, however, I did have to prop the items on a table when I was assembling the bottom cushion to the legs. The cushions are thick enough and the material is soft. I've had several people sit in them so I know it can hold someone who's 300 lbs. I don't know how long they will last, I guess it depends on how often they're used. But overall, I got a bargain. The price was very reasonable for some great chairs. I recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and professional looking
reviews.reviewText: I have been very pleased with these chairs. My husband suffers from Parkinson’s disease. He struggles to stand up from a chair that has no arms. These are sturdy and extremely well-made and easy to put together. I recommend them highly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Ease of assembly was a plus. It is adequately comfortable for the price. Don’t expect too much from it as it’s not an expensive item, but it does the job nicely as a back up chair when needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: These were easy enough to put together and sturdy and comfortable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Worked great in our shop office

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Screws did not fit
reviews.reviewText: Putting these chairs together was way harder than it had to be. 4 of the screws for each chair I purchased did not fit. Instead of sending these chairs back I chose to run to Home Depot to buy screws. Pretty unfortunate! I do like the comfort of the chairs. Making sure the right screws are packaged would have given this review a higher rating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: As shown, very nice, great price.
